## Overview

[Homebrew](https://brew.sh/) is a utility that helps install many common data science tools on Mac devices. The instillation process is fairly simple, but may use tools you are unfamiliar with. Please follow these steps closely.

First, press the open the launchpad by either pressing `F4`, or pinching on the track pad with three fingers and your thumb. 

![]()

Next, search for the `Terminal` program, and click on it to launch it.

![]()

In the window the pops up, paste the following text entirely: `/bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)"`

Afterwards, press enter.

![]()

It will ask for your password. This is the password you use to log in to the device. **You will not be able to see your password as you type it. This is normal.**
